column5: Here they are everyone.  Enjoy.    POLISH MISTAKES  1 lb. ground beef 1 lb. hot bulk sausage 1 lb. Velveta cheese (cut in chunks) 1 tsp. garlic powder 1 tsp. oregano 1 Tbsp. Worchestire sauce 2 loaves party rye  Brown meats separately and drain.  Combine with cheese and seasonings.  Cool slightly.  Spread on bread.  Preheat oven to 350. Bake for 15 minutes.   CHICKEN DIP   1 can of Canned Chicken 1 8 oz.package of Cream Cheese 2 cups Shredded Colby Jack Cheese Â½ cup Barbecue Sauce or Hot Sauce, depending on preference 1 cup ranch dressing  Mix all Ingredients (I make sure the chicken is shredded) and heat at 350 degrees until its melted and hot.  Stir frequently.   Serve with tortilla chips.  You can add more chicken, cheese or sauces if you want.   I added more chicken and shredded cheese than called for by the recipe at Lakair.
That be tasty eats.  They were well received to wide acclaim.  Thanks, Marty.
Thanks Marty.  An attorney types two recipes....do you know how much those two recipes are worth per word?
If you have to ask, you can't afford it.  Good eats Marty, thanks.
WOO HOO!! I've been waiting for that chicken recipe....guess what I want for dinner tomorrow night?? LOL.  Thanks a lot...that chicken rocked up at Lakair.
A couple great dishes that were receiving RAVE reviews.   Thanks Marty.
Thx Marty,them's sure good eats........TC and tight lines all......Chuck...
